use.flag: Support Aple Lossless Audio Codec (through FAAD2)
Support Game Music Emu plugin for NSF, AY, etc plugin
Support GNU Portable Threads instead of POSIX
Support commodore64 SID player based on libsidplay2 plugin
Support libayemy VTX ZX-Spectrum music player plugin
Support AOSDK plugin for for DSF,PSF,QSF,SSF formats
Support DUMB module plugin, for MOD, S3M, etc plugin
Support SHN based on xmms-shn plugin
